00029 /* Creation flags. */
00030 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00031 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00032 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00033 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 0xff))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00034 
00035 /* Status/mode flags. */
00036 #define T_BLOCKED XNPEND
00037 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00038 #define T_READY   XNREADY
00039 #define T_DORMANT XNDORMANT
00040 #define T_STARTED XNSTARTED
00041 #define T_BOOST   XNBOOST
00042 #define T_LOCK    XNLOCK
00043 #define T_RRB     XNRRB
00044 #define T_NOSIG   XNASDI
00045 #define T_SHIELD  XNSHIELD
00046 
00047 /* Task hook types. */
00048 #define T_HOOK_START  XNHOOK_THREAD_START
00049 #define T_HOOK_SWITCH XNHOOK_THREAD_SWITCH
00050 #define T_HOOK_DELETE XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE
00051 #define T_DESC(cookie) thread2rtask(cookie)
00052 
00053 /* Priority range (same bounds as fusion, but reversed). */
00054 #define T_HIPRIO  FUSION_LOW_PRIO
00055 #define T_LOPRIO  FUSION_HIGH_PRIO
00056 #define rtprio2xn(rtprio) (FUSION_HIGH_PRIO - (rtprio) + 1)
00057 #define xnprio2rt(xnprio) (T_LOPRIO + (xnprio) - 1)

00091

00094 
00095     xntimer_t timer;
00096

00102

00104 
00105     xnarch_cpumask_t affinity;

00110             int mode;

00112         } event;

00123 } RT_TASK;

00125 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00126 {
00127     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00128 }
